ctl:test.name: owsTests:ows-OWS.GetCapabilities-Exceptions.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: In the event that a GetCapabilities request cannot be processed for any reason, the response entity shall include an exception report. The exception code must be one of those listed in Table 5.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: GetCapabilities with a bogus service parameter value ('ADSF'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the ExceptionReport shall have the 'InvalidParameterValue' exception code; (4) theExceptionReport @locator value shall be that of the invalid parameter.

ctl:code.ctl:message: GetCapabilities with a bogus service parameter value (ADSF). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the ExceptionReport shall have the 'InvalidParameterValue' exception code; (4) theExceptionReport @locator value shall be that of the invalid parameter.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: The returned exception report was expected to contain an exceptionCode of "InvalidParameterValue" and a locator value of "service".

ctl:test.name: owsTests:ows-OWS.GetCapabilities-UpdateSequence.1

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: The returned exception report was expected to contain an exceptionCode of "InvalidUpdateSequence".

ctl:test.name: owsTests:ows-OWS.GetCapabilities-Exceptions.5

ctl:test.name: owsTests:ows-OWS.GetCapabilities-AcceptVersions.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: If AcceptVersion is not specified, the service must respond with highest supported version.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: GetCapabilities with no version and service of $serviceType. Without AcceptVersion, using version negotiation, sends latest copy. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:WFS_Capabilities document; (3) the response version must be what was requested.

ctl:test.name: owsTests:ows-OWS.GetCapabilities-AcceptVersions.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Version negotiation using AcceptVersions parameter (preference ordering): Return service metadata corresponding to the most preferred version that is supported. If none of the requested versions are supported, the server must generate an exception with code 'VersionNegotiationFailed'.

Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:WFS_Capabilities document; (3) the response version must be what was requested. The AcceptVersion element is used with a number of versions, one is expected to return ('1.1.0').

Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:WFS_Capabilities document; (3) the response version must be what was requested. The AcceptVersion element is used with a number of versions, one is expected to return (''1.1.0'').')

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.
